meanings.definition: A black eye or bruise on the face.
meanings.sent1: After the fight, he had a shiner on his eye.
meanings.sent2: She covered her shiner with makeup to hide it.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his shiner made him look like a tough guy.
meanings.sent4: The shiner on her face was a visible reminder of the altercation.
meanings.sent5: The shiner was a painful reminder of the punch he received.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that shines, such as a bright light or polished surface.

meanings.sent2: The diamond ring was a dazzling shiner on her finger.
meanings.sent3: The disco ball was the ultimate shiner at the party.
meanings.sent4: His smile was the shiner that lit up the room.
